item.title: Donna add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Donna add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "Don't pay any attention to what they write about you. Just measure it in inches." -- Andy Warhol

item.title: Donna add a quote by William Styron
item.description: "A great book should leave you with many experiences, and slightly exhausted at the end. You live several lives while reading." -- William Styron

item.title: Donna add a quote by Joseph Addison
item.description: "Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body." -- Joseph Addison

item.title: Donna add a quote by Carlos Ruiz Zafón
item.description: "Books are mirrors: you only see in them what you already have inside you." -- Carlos Ruiz Zafón

item.title: Donna add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Wicked people never have time for reading. It's one of the reasons for their wickedness." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Donna add a quote by Ved Mehta
item.description: "Surely only boring people went in for conversations consisting of questions and answers. The art of true conversation consisted in the play of minds." -- Ved Mehta

item.title: Donna add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Don't let the bastards grind you down." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Donna add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Good friends, good books, and a sleepy conscience: this is the ideal life." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Donna add a quote by Ezra Pound
item.description: "Literature is news that stays news." -- Ezra Pound

item.title: Donna add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Donna add a quote by Amy Sedaris
item.description: "I think it's good for a person to spend time alone. It gives them an opportunity to discover who they are and to figure out why they are always alone." -- Amy Sedaris

item.title: Donna add a quote by Tina Fey
item.description: "Some people say, “Never let them see you cry.” I say, if you’re so mad you could just cry, then cry. It terrifies everyone." -- Tina Fey

item.title: Donna add a quote by William Strunk Jr.
item.description: "Omit needless words." -- William Strunk Jr.

item.title: Donna add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Donna add a quote by Margaret Laurence
item.description: "I can't change what's happened to me in my life, or make what's not occurred take place. But I can't say I like it, or accept it, or believe it's for the best. I don't and never shall, not even if I'm damned for it." -- Margaret Laurence

item.title: Donna add a quote by Donald E. Westlake
item.description: "Nobody gets everything in this life. You decide your priorities and you make your choices. I'd decided long ago that any cake I had would be eaten." -- Donald E. Westlake

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "Because you are defined not by life's imperfect moments, but by your reaction to them. And because there is joy in embracing - rather than running from - the utter absurdity of life." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "You should just accept who you are, flaws and all, because if you try to be someone you aren't, then eventually some turkey is going to shit all over your well-crafted facade, so you might as well save yourself the effort and enjoy your zombie books." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "I can finally see that all the terrible parts of my life, the embarrassing parts, the incidents I wanted to pretend never happened, and the things that make me "weird" and "different," were actually the most important parts of my life. They were the parts that made me ME." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "No really. What exactly did you do today, Jenny? Quantify it for me." "It's not quantifiable. There aren't even metrics for the shit I do." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "...and whenever I had menstral cramps, I could just pretend that Voldemort was close." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows where all your bodies are buried. Because they're the ones who helped you put them there." And sometimes, if you're really lucky, they help you dig them back up." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "I am the Wizard of Oz of housewives (in that I am both "Great and Terrible" and because I sometimes hide behind the curtains" -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "I picked up the phone to call the police, but then I considered how it would sound when I told them that I was calling from inside my bathroom, where I’d OD’ed on laxatives, and that a possible rapist was quietly passing me notes under the bathroom door." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "I try to be appreciative of what I have instead of bitter about what I’ve lost." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "It's true, I did say I wanted girlfriends," I capitulated hesitantly, "but couldn't we start with something smaller and less terrifying? Like maybe spend a weekend at a crack house? I heard those people are very nonjudgmental, and if you accidentally say something offensive you can just blame it on their hallucinations." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "When I was in junior high I read a lot of Danielle Steele. So I always assumed that the day I got engaged I'd be naked, covered in rose petals, and sleeping with the brother of the man who'd kidnapped me." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "Knock-knock, motherfucker." -- Jenny Lawson

item.title: Donna add a quote by Jenny Lawson
item.description: "Then I yelled through his door, "It's an anniversary gift for you, asshole. Two whole weeks early. FIFTEEN YEARS IS BIG METAL CHICKENS." -- Jenny Lawson
